_note: Fleet configuration for ATM. Adding a server here auto-registers it in the dashboard and fleet proxy. Reload with POST /fleet/reload.
_format: Each server needs: id (unique slug), name (display), host (proxy prefix, empty for same-origin), ip (actual IP), role (atm|ghosthands), environment, region, type. ec2InstanceId enables direct EC2 API calls (avoids IP-based resolution which breaks on stop/start).
